nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hello Dr Person1. Person2 once again is in pain from the gall bladder drain that is sitting on a nerve. I will not have him go through the severe pain again that he went through 2 days ago. Obviously the block did not work and he is in pain again. Please have Dr  Person3 or Dr  Person4  or the IR Radiology contact me immediately.
